1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, the cast of Friends along with Conan O’Brien are sitting andNEWLINEtalking.

lines.Line: It’s a tradition here on Friends after every taping for me toNEWLINEhang out with you guys, (They all laugh) talk down the episode umm… The point of thisNEWLINEwhole thing is what people see in America is: they see Friends, they love the show,NEWLINEit looks like a smooth running machine, but behind the scenes there’s deceit,NEWLINEmistrust, and hate. And I thought, I thought we’d actually take a look at uh,NEWLINEy’know some of these moments where you guys are—there are mistakes. You makeNEWLINEmistakes
For example, I don’t have to memorize lines. You guys actually haveNEWLINEto remember what to say and you probably forget from time to time. Yes
Our energy just comes way up when there’s an audience here, andNEWLINEwhen that happens, something happens between your brain and your mouth sometimes and itNEWLINEjust doesn’t, it just doesn’t work
